keyword: how many calories in a small avocado
title: How Many Calories in a Small Avocado?
meta_description: Learn how many calories in a small avocado, plus detailed nutrition facts like fats, fiber, carbs, protein, and easy tweaks for recipes.
h1: How Many Calories in a Small Avocado?
assumptions: Small Hass avocado (~100 g edible portion, pitted and peeled); raw, no added ingredients.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variety, ripeness, growing conditions, and preparation; check labels or sources for specifics.

quick_answer.text: A small avocado provides ~160 kcal, mostly from healthy monounsaturated fats.

label_note: Values align with Nutrition Facts labels for straightforward comparison.

tweaks.label: Sliced on 1 slice whole wheat toast
Blended into guacamole with 1 tbsp onion and tomato

faqs.q: How many calories in half a small avocado?
faqs.a: About 80 kcal for half, with ~7.4 g fat and 3.4 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is a small avocado low carb?
faqs.a: Yes, ~8.5 g net carbs after 6.7 g fiber, making it keto-friendly.

faqs.q: How much fat is in a small avocado?
faqs.a: Approximately 14.7 g total fat, mostly healthy unsaturated fats.
A small one has ~2 g protein, not a significant source but adds to meals.

faqs.q: What size is a small avocado?
faqs.a: Typically ~100 g edible portion; whole weight around 136 g including pit and skin.
